Site-visit to SMK Taman Perling
===============================

by [attpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/attpic/ "Posts by attpic")
 | Jan 13, 2017 | [ATT](https://fke.utm.my/category/att/)

Our member, Dr Nurzal Effiyana hav e site-visited SMK Taman Perling to discuss the problems that they are facing in order for us to come up with the best solution.
